title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document project requirements from stakeholders, including functional, non-functional, and user experience requirements.

title: Design Overall System Architecture
description: Create an architectural design that outlines the major components and their interactions for the GeneticOptimizer.

title: Develop User Interface (Frontend)
description: Design and implement the user-facing interface for the GeneticOptimizer, focusing on usability and accessibility.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Create the backend services that handle data processing and analysis for the GeneticOptimizer.

title: Set Up Database Schema
description: Create and set up the database schema required for storing user genetics data and analysis results.

title: Integrate Frontend with Backend Services
description: Connect the frontend interface to the backend services for data processing and analysis.

title: Perform Unit Tests and Debug
description: Write unit tests for the individual components of the GeneticOptimizer and fix any identified issues.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a thorough security audit to ensure the GeneticOptimizer meets industry standards and best practices.

title: Deploy GeneticOptimizer
description: Prepare the GeneticOptimizer for production deployment, including infrastructure setup and configuration.
